title: Countries with the lowest infant mortality rate 2017
yAxis: Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births in each Country on the y axis.
The Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is appeared to be the highest at Country Luxembourg and lowest at Country Monaco.
There is a difference of 1.6 between the maximum Country Luxembourg and minimum Country Monaco.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births for 20 number of Countrys.
The Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is appeared to be the highest at Country Luxembourg and lowest at Country Monaco.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births in each Country on the y axis.
The Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is appeared to be the highest at Country Luxembourg and lowest at Country Monaco.
There is a difference of 1.6 between the maximum Country Luxembourg and minimum Country Monaco.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births for 20 number of Countrys.
The Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is highest at Country Luxembourg and lowest at Country Monaco.
The second highest Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is appeared to be the Country Germany.
Country Monaco has 1.89 times less Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births than Country Luxembourg which is the highest.
Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births at Country Luxembourg is 3.4 , second place is Germany at 3.4, and thirdly is Germany at 3.4.
Similar Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is found in Country Luxembourg, Austria, Belgium, and Germany.
The average Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births in all 20 Countrys is 2.82.
The Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is 56.5 if we add up values of all Countrys.
